name: Golfrog
description:
A little project for ADGD's Frog Jam, made in about 10 hours.

Mouse control only, use LMB to aim & jump and RMB to grab onto things with toyur tongue.

Scoring is based on the amount of tries & jumps to get to the goal on each level, plus flies eaten.

Music by CodeManu, from htts://opengameart.org/content/platformer-game-music-pack
